string-array.name: greeting_positive_messages
string-array.item: Hey it\'s been a while, how have you been?

string-array.name: greeting_negative_messages
string-array.item: We can talk about it later.

string-array.name: question_positive_messages
string-array.item: Have you thought of any interesting paradoxes lately?
We\'re gonna go to the movies tonight, wanna come?
What\'s your favorite subject - Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, or Math?
Have you ever been to the MOSH?
Have you considered becoming a mentor?
Did you see that booth showcasing Nanotechnology?
Have you thought about Biomedical engineering?
The Chemical engineering exhibit is awesome - have you seen it?
Which exhibit do you think is the most interesting?
Did you have any interesting ideas for a booth?
Did you hear that presentation about Genetic engineering?

string-array.name: question_neutral_messages
string-array.item: When did you last see the doctor?
Did you eat breakfast this morning?
Did you sleep well last night?
Have you been to the gym lately?
What do you want to know?
What should we talk about now?

string-array.name: question_negative_messages
string-array.item: Have you thought of any interesting paradoxes lately?
Where did you come up with that idea?

string-array.name: statement_positive_messages
string-array.item: Maybe we should volunteer for the event.
I attended a lecture about GMOs - it was really interesting!
I like it when it\'s sunny!

string-array.name: statement_neutral_messages
string-array.item: I think I\'ll go for a walk today.
I need to go check on the neighbor\'s dog.
I\'m not sure how I feel about that.
Not a cloud in the sky.
I don\'t think they have much credibility.
More of a delay than anything.
An interesting thought just occurred to me…

string-array.name: statement_negative_messages
string-array.item: I don\'t think that\'s a good idea.
I really don\'t like the sound of that.

string-array.name: response_positive_messages
string-array.item: Of course! I need just a few minutes.

string-array.name: response_neutral_messages
string-array.item: I\'m not sure how I feel about that.
If the juice is worth the squeeze.
I could really use a drink right now.
Not too bad, busy as ever.
Oh, fine… You know how it is.

string-array.name: response_negative_messages
string-array.item: Next time think before you speak?

string-array.name: unique_male_statement_messages
string-array.item: Dude, we should hit the bar this weekend.
Let\'s go shoot some pool later this week.
Just took my truck into the shop, got a bad fuel injector.
You been watching the news? My retirement plan is tanking…
I think a degree in Robotics engineering would be pretty cool.
I saw a movie the other day about a guy that escapes from prison; for the life of me I can\'t remember the name of it.

string-array.name: unique_female_statement_messages
string-array.item: I\'m thinking about adopting a puppy :)
My boss really creeps me out.
I got a flat tire on the way to work, what a disaster :(
We should really check out that new restaurant!
Growing up, I really wanted to be a veterinarian.
My sister became a Registered Nurse!
